page.title: 12HOUSING, HOCKLIFFE
page.content: The{majority of houses are privately {owned.} There are{three major types}of housing, detached older houses, small council house estates and small private housing estates. Of the{older detached houses}many are of historic and architectural interest and vary in size from large houses in their own grounds to small cottages. Many of the cottages have low ceilings and sash windows and are of{timber {construction}but modernisation has made it difficult to determine their age until you get inside. Some have evidence of{window tax}in their blocked up windows. {The three council estates are pre war and include semi-detached, terraced and bungalows{with large gardens. Of the private estates{Hockley Court is the most recent and consists of{one {bedroomed starter homes.
